---
title: Custom Phone Case
description: A template for creating custom phone cases, perfect for marketing agencies and designers who want to offer unique and personalized phone accessories to their clients.

_"CaseCobra is a modern e-commerce platform that empowers users to design custom phone cases using their own images. Rather than buying a generic case, customers can upload a photo or artwork, preview it on the selected phone model, configure finishes, and place an order.”_
- High-quality, durable materials  
- 5-year print guarantee  
- Support for modern iPhone models


## Features

Here are some of the key features of CaseCobra:

- Image upload via drag-and-drop or file selector  
- Real-time preview of the uploaded image on a phone case mockup  
- Configurable options: phone models, colors, materials, finishes  
- Responsive UI, mobile-friendly experience  
- E-commerce flow: cart, checkout, payments  
- Admin dashboard to manage orders and update order statuses  
- Authentication & user accounts  
- Email confirmation / “Thank You” page after purchase  
- Durable print quality and 5-year print warranty (as advertised)

## Installation & Setup (from GitHub)

Here’s a sample installation guide you can include (adapt as needed):

### 1. Clone the repo
```bash
git clone https://github.com/sahilkumardev/case-cobra.git
cd case-cobra
```

### 2. Install dependencies (using pnpm, npm, or yarn)
```bash
pnpm install
# or
npm install
```

- _config the .env file before running the server._

### 3. Run the development server
```bash
pnpm dev
# or
npm run dev
```
